Text: This certain copy.. and I don't know about others, got Comcast to shut down my service because of copy infringement. Don't torrent this unless you want this REALLY REALLY BADLY.

if you are being sent messages from your ISP, download Peerblock. do a Google search and follow the links. it's light weight and will stop those pesky do-gooders from bothering you with annoying threats of law suits and other criminal nonsense!

@deffjam555, thanks much! been looking for this!

This film is not complete. The subtitles at the end just before the credits that tell what happened to everyone after college are missing. This is a very important part of the film and why anyone would remove them is beyond me. My advice is to find another torrent. Shame on whoever removed them.
